DOC.brief_summary: This non-interventional study conduct Europe . The study retrospective prospective . The purpose study assess frequency hypoglycaemia ( low blood glucose ) insulin-treated patient type 1 type 2 diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: French Observational Survey Assess Hypoglycaemia Insulin-treated Diabetic Patients
DOC.criteria: Patients Type 1 Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus Patients treat insulin least 12 month Patients able perform capillary selfmonitoring plasma glucose ( SMPG ) measurements Patients able complete questionnaire Patients accept participate survey ( signature information notice ) Patients Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus treat insulin Females currently pregnant lactate pregnant previous year
